name: The Pond
description: The Pond is a movie starring Marco Canadea, Paul Leonard Murray, and Leslie Soo. Anthropology professor was kicked out from his university for claiming to be on the threshold of an apocalyptic discovery. Someone or something is...

review.name: A Masterpiece (of Boredom)
review.reviewBody: There are 2 people who deserve awards for this art film, #1 who ever was in charge of filming it because it is filled with great shots and #2, who ever put together the trailer to make this look interesting. Believe me it is not ! The shame of it is, is that by it's end I can see at the heart of it was an interesting story, but this story was told in the least fascinating way possible. Everything about this is dull, the script, the performances, the pace. I kept watching out of curiosity and struggled to stay awake the whole time. As a photographer , I was in awe at how nice the movie looks and professional. Everything else said "amateur". Honestly there is little at all to see here. You could open up a book of interesting photographs and get more substance than what is put on the screen. I wish I had read reviews before watching as I feel like a chunk of my life has been wasted.
